data.actual_result: List refreshes. Note that *only* the user list refreshes, emote tabs and displayed count are still the same. So I don't think the client is trying to look for newest added reactions or something
data.short_description: User list in reactions refreshes when opening a user profile and going back
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a message with reactions - Long press on it and open Reactions - Open a user profile in the list of people who reacted - Press Back button
